content: string of pearls succulent with pot elv needleworks string of pearls succulent what you will need ● size g crochet hook ● green yarn for leaves ● stuffing ● grey yarn for pot ● yarn needle ● light green for pot ● weighted beads optional ● brown for dirt ● plastic sheet or cardboard optional terms you should know magic_ring chain - chain stitch scinc - single_crochet increase second row spike stitch back loop only slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet third row spike stitch all terms are us terms page 2 elv needleworks ©2022 string of pearls succulent pattern leaves each leaf strand is worked individually using green yarn make 9 row 1 work chain until length of chain measures between 12 and 18 turn make each strand a different size to help with the realism of your plant work 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook work a slip_stitch into the first single_crochet you just worked ch2 work 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook work a slip_stitch into the first single_crochet you just worked row 2 work 6 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook then work a slip_stitch into the first single_crochet you just worked this completes the first leaf *slip_stitch in the next five chain stitches ch2 work 6 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook work a slip_stitch into the first single_crochet you just worked repeat from * until you have between 6 and 2 chain stitches left to work slip_stitch to end tie off page 3 elv needleworks ©2022 string of pearls succulent leave about 1 to 2 long yarn tails on your leaf strands for attaching later pot using grey make a magic_ring row 1 work 6 single_crochet into magic_ring slip_stitch to first single_crochet 6 stitches row 2 ch1 scinc in each stitch around join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 12 stitches row 3 ch1 *single_crochet scinc repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 18 stitches row 4 c1 *single_crochet single_crochet scinc repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 24 stitches row 5 ch1 *2sc scinc 2sc repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 30 stitches row 6 ch1 *5sc scinc repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 36 stitches row 7 ch1 *3sc scinc 3sc repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 42 stitches row 8 ch1 single_crochet in each stitch around join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 42 stitches row 9 ch1 single_crochet in blo of each stitch around join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 42 stitches row repeat row 8 42 stitches 10-28 switch to light green yarn page 4 elv needleworks ©2022 string of pearls succulent second row spike stitch is a single_crochet worked around the last row into the second row third row spike stitch is a single_crochet worked around the second to last and last row into the third row row 29 ch1 *2sc second row spike stitch third row spike
